extendedInfo.description: An open source, full-featured remote for XBMC. It features library browsing, direct remote control and a slick interface. It's still beta but we're getting there.PERMISSIONS: Please see Wiki page on Google code before rating down because of private data access. This app is open source after all.HONEYCOMB USERS:Please note that this app is now available to Honeycomb tablets, but it's far from optimized. We're working on that.VOLUME:Use the hardware buttons of your phone while the remote is running.INSTALLATION:There is a complete and updated installation guide in the Wiki, featured on the front page of the website.BUGS:Please use the forum or the bugtracker. Comments in here are read sporadically but more for amusement than for serious debugging.

reviews.title: Good but needs some improvements
reviews.comment: Great idea to control your xbmc using your smartphone. Sometimes a bit buggy, and the design... well no comment on this (same for the xbmc web-ui). Some work is still needed to make this app awesome. So keep going!
reviews.author: Robert B

reviews.title: Good Remote
reviews.comment: I love this remote. Simple but effective. Would give 5 stars if volume buttons available directly rather than fiddling about with menus. Other than that, NICE!!
reviews.author: Nik Honeychurch

reviews.title: Update broke App
reviews.comment: App updated, even though I have updated turned off and now I cant browse my TV Shows. Worked flawless before update. You need to roll this back!!
reviews.author: Steve Bedwell

reviews.title: Great App But
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Works like charm, but would even be greater if it auto searched the XBMC host, used the mobile device keyboard to type onscreen and better GUI for the bigger screen tablets
reviews.author: BERNARD OMUONY

reviews.title: Null Pointer Exception
reviews.comment: If you open for example the movie list without any movie in it, you get a nullpointer exception. Would be nice if you fix it.
reviews.author: Sebastian Sommer

reviews.title: Very buggy,
reviews.comment: Works perfect on our iPad, very buggy on galaxy tab 7 and S3 lte, loses the ability to use the remote pad, all it could do in the end is play a film from the movies library.
reviews.author: Terry Griffin

reviews.title: Frodo wrecked xbmc
reviews.comment: Uuto updated after I told it not too!!!!! Have rolled back to eden due to many many issues with frodo and none of the devs seem bothered. This remote doesnt work properly with eden anymore so had to download an old apk and disable auto-updating. Shame really as the update should be good but it seems like they rushed it.
reviews.author: Darren Polak

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Was nervous to update since all the negative reviews, but it works perfect for me. Seemed to fix issues I had before. Although a bit basic and interface could use a lift, I still love it. Great app guys!
reviews.author: Steven Barnett

reviews.title: Seriously flawed
reviews.comment: Queuing is broken, \'Now Playing\' shows nothing. Still uses the (deprecated???) HTTP API. Still suffers from frequent timeouts on connection and other operations. Still deletes hosts on uninstall. This release is worse than prior \'beta\' releases. Stay on Eden with the prior remote release to maintain basic functionality.
reviews.author: Tom Warren

reviews.title: Not Bad!
reviews.comment: Does what it says on the tin, had to find the setup info separately but nonetheless a good app.
reviews.author: Mark Lee

reviews.title: Works then goes Berserk.
reviews.comment: Works well until for no apparent reason it gets key stuck in a direction. Gets berserk. Have to alt f4 outta there. Would give it more stars if it didn\'t do that.  Droid RAZR Maxx XT912 JB 4.1.2 Stock.
reviews.author: John Peralta

reviews.title: One feature I would like
reviews.comment: I would love multi window support, but I\'m sure that\'s coming :D  Awesome app otherwise.
reviews.author: James Epp

reviews.title: No queuing, no multiple play
reviews.comment: Can\'t queue an entire folder anymore. Nor can I play an entire folder. Remote and all works perfect. And I know it used to work all well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy.
reviews.comment: Randomly acts like it has a stuck button and xbmc goes insane. Happens on multiple devices and systems. Have to reboot my xbmc box. PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great remote
reviews.comment: Awesome remote. My only complaint is that I can\'t browse my Video add ons from the remote. I.e like the iPhone version.
reviews.author: Mark Garman

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Eat you heart out plex. This is really a cool little feature. Still in beta so quit whining you bunch of trolls. Keep up the great work everyone who makes xbmc possible!
reviews.author: William Baxter

reviews.title: Great remote
reviews.comment: Does everything I need it to do to eliminate a keyboard sitting out on the coffee table. The text notifications and pause during phone calls is also great
reviews.author: Myles Koertje

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Wish it would load the last screen selected or the remote by default. Other than that, it\'s a great app!  I use mine with the raspberry pi xbmc edition and it works great!
reviews.author: David Stricker

reviews.title: Very Buggy
reviews.comment: If you thought this app was bad enough on Eden with Frodo its almost unusable. The skin is perfect but playing music tracks is broken, timeouts occur frequently. Am now using Yatse which is flawless.
reviews.author: Justin Robertson

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t win any awards for graphic appeal but dang if it doesn\'t work well as a remote for my android stb. Better than the IR remote that came w my gbox. The future is here.
reviews.author: John Haynes
